column4: how do I run the command jsc from the terminal to get a javascript console
javascript is a web scripting language, and it belongs in a web browser. Follow the guide, instead of trying to run it in a terminal.
I can, but you aren't listening. Javascript does not belong in a terminal.
Okay, I have no experience with jsc, and you can just create files with vim or something and open it in your browser. I would tell you how to use the command line but I dont know.
